discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment:
Still the changelog should mention the existence of the new instances :
- in `ssralg.v`, the type `bool` is canonically a `fieldType` with additive law `addb` and multiplicative law `andb`
- in `finalg.v`, the type `bool` is canonically a `finFieldType` and a `decFieldType`.

discussion.author: thery
discussion.comment: Don't understand why there is still the one change asked by a review. I have marked it was resolved. Should I dismiss the review?

discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment:
> Don't understand why there is still the one change asked by a review. I have marked it was resolved. Should I dismiss the review?

No you should ping me for reviewing my review.

review_discussion.author: CohenCyril
review_discussion.comment: This does not look resolved. Please do not click "resolve" until the fix is pushed. If you push a commit fixing it, it will resolve itself automatically.

review_discussion.author: CohenCyril
review_discussion.comment: Actually this changelog is irrelevant, specific names of canonical structures should not be mentioned (only their existence) and private lemmas (justifying structure instanciation) should be omitted.
